Text: Trump walked to the church that rioters tried to burn down last night and held up a Bible. Predictably, some are losing their minds. If he hadn't acknowledged the church burning, they'd criticize him for that, too. Good grief.
BIDEN says of frontline medical workers — doctors, nurses, EMTs, and more — in the Covid-19 pandemic."We need to do more than praise them," he says. "We need to *pay* them."
Joe Biden gave us more compassion and empathy in one speech today than not only more than Trump has shown over the past four years--but more than Trump will ever be able to show.
